title: Contribute
text: py/ghe_extract: general python library using llama_cloud_services extract JSONs pdfs produce flat CSV py/: ORD specific files containing schemas describing extracted variables main.py used execute extraction R/: contains code clean flattened JSON resulting extraction

title: Contribute
text: Place ORD - YYYYMMDD.zip files raw/ run: script create raw/ORD_files following tree structure: containing docs zip files
code: ./unzip.sh ORD files ├── Contribute │   ├── Tilley │   │   ├── application │   │   └── final report │   ... ├── Establish └── Explore

title: Contribute
code: python3 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate pip install -r requirements.txt

title: Contribute
text: Get API key : https://cloud.llamaindex.ai/login

title: Contribute
text: Either environmental variable LLAMA_CLOUD_API_KEY edit main.py pass LlamaCloudExtractor(api_key='') run main code

title: Contribute
text: Delete files: command delete pdfs dir recursively

title: Authors and Citation
text: Nicolò Massari. Author, contributor, maintainer. Lars Schöbitz. Author, contributor. Elizabeth Tilley. Author, funder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Massari N, Schöbitz L, Tilley E (2025). “ethord: ETH Board Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata Report Data.” https://global-health-engineering.github.io/ethord.
code: @Misc{massari_etall:2025,   title = {ethord: ETH Board Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data},   author = {Nicolò Massari and Lars Schöbitz and Elizabeth Tilley},   year = {2025},   url = {https://global-health-engineering.github.io/ethord},   abstract = {ETH Open Research Data dataset, A colletion of metadata and report data of a CHF 15 million ETH domain program dedicated to increase the visibility and the impact of their research within the scientific community, the economy and society as a whole.},   version = {0.0.1}, }
